update cp_picture_downloadrecord set DOWNLOAD_TIME = #{downloadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "PICTURE_GROUP _ID" = #{pictureGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PICTURE_ID = #{pictureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PICTURE_SIZE = #{pictureSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICTURE_TYPE = #{pictureType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SITE_ID = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WATERMARKER = #{watermarker,jdbcType=TINYINT}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT c.ID id, c.DOWNLOAD_TIME downloadTime, c.PICTURE_GROUP_ID pictureGroupId, c.PICTURE_ID pictureId, d.TITLE title, d.UPLOADER uploader, e.TITLE groupTitle, d.FILENAME filename FROM cp_picture_downloadrecord c ,cp_picture d, cp_pic_group e WHERE c.PICTURE_ID =d.ID and d.GROUP_ID=e.ID AND c.SITE_ID = #{siteId} AND c.USER_ID = #{userId} AND e.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') AND d.UPLOADER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{uploader},'%')
AND d.FILENAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{fileName},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.DOWNLOAD_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{starttime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.DOWNLOAD_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK) <= date(c.DOWNLOAD_TIME)
and c.USERNAME=#{userName}
AND e.LANG_TYPE = #{langType} ORDER BY c.DOWNLOAD_TIME DESC
